home.SEND_MONEY_TITLE: Every Vianex money transfer is backed by Viamericas, a #1 ranked and trusted international money transfer company with over $12 billion in safely sent transactions since 2001.
home.SEND_MONEY_DESCRIPTION: With great rates and low fees, Vianex offers thousands of convenient cash payout locations throughout Mexico, Central and South America, the Philippines and India, or you can chose to have money deposited into a bank account. Register in just moments and start sending money immediately.
home.STEP_TWO_ALT: Wallet showing money and a card
home.GET_QUOTE_ALT: A money transfer quote showing a money transfer exchange rate
home.GET_MORE_DESCRIPTION: Vianex gives you more options to send money easily.
home.MORE_WAYS_SEND_DESCRIPTION_1: Send money from your computer or mobile phone, or visit one of our thousands of retail agent
home.MORE_WAYS_PAY_DESCRIPTION_1: Use your debit card, credit card, or a bank account to pay for your online money transfer. Or pay with cash at any of our retail
home.MORE_WAYS_RECEIVE_DESCRIPTION_1: Pick up cash at one our 40,000+ convenient payout
home.MORE_WAYS_RECEIVE_DESCRIPTION_2: across 34 countries, or choose direct deposit into a bank account.
home.PROS_SEND_ALT: Paper plane to represent sending money online
home.PROS_RECEIVE_ALT: Arrow into wallet shows receiving an online money transfer to bank account or in cash
home.PROS_TRACK_ALT: Location icon to track international online money transfer
home.PROS_SEND_CAPTION: Sign in and start sending money right away using your debit card, credit card or bank account.
home.PROS_RECEIVE_CAPTION: Pick up at any Viamericas payout location, or receive money directly into a bank account.
home.PROS_TRACK_CAPTION: Track each transaction so you know when it is complete. Vianex provides peace of mind.
home.RATES_SUBTITLE: Vianex helps your money go further with highly competitive fees and exchange rates
home.RATES_TEXT: Vianex offers extremely attractive money transfer rates and convenience by partnering with local banks and payout locations near you. We understand that sending money should be easy for you and your recipients. That’s why Vianex gives you so many options for money transfer.
home.BANER_TEXT_1: At home or on the go, send money 24/7 from the U.S. to 34 countries around the world.
home.BANER_TITLE_2: #1 in Money Transfer. We Did It Again!
home.BANER_TEXT_2: Once again, we ranked first among top 30 remittance providers in the Inter-American Dialogue Remittances Transfers Scorecard 2016.
home.BANER_TEXT_3: With transfer fees starting as low as $4.99, you don't need to wait for a special occasion to send money.
home.NORTON_CAPTION: Vianex partners with Norton for a safe online experience
home.PCI_CAPTION: PCI certified for safety when using your credit and debit cards
home.IFC_CAPTION: Licensed in 49 of the 50 United States and backed by the
home.MOBILE_APP_SUBTITLE: Send money any time from your phone.
home.MOBILE_APP_DESCRIPTION: With the new Vianex mobile app, you can send money any time, any where from your phone. Use your online account on your mobile app and access all of your saved settings. The same great rates in the palm of your hand.
home.ERROR: Prices are currently unavailable for this country.

home_mexico.BANNER_DESC_2: With fees stating at $4.99 and over 19,000 pay out locations, your money goes further with Vianex.
home_mexico.TITLE_PARTNERS: Great Partners Mean More Savings For You
home_mexico.DESC_CREATE_ACCOUNT: Create an account in just minutes and you can start sending money right away. Send money using a credit or debit card, or directly from your bank account.
home_mexico.BOTTOM_DESC_1: Bank deposit to all major banks in Mexico
home_mexico.BOTTOM_DESC_2: Cash pick up at over 19,000 locations
home_mexico.ERROR: Prices are currently unavailable for this country.

register.RECEIVE_SMS: Receive SMS alerts about your transactions (optional)

cashPickup.DESC: We have thousands of pick-up locations to choose from. What works best for you?

destination.TITLE: Destination Information
destination.DESC: Choose the country you wish to send money to.
destination.SHOW_NATIONAL_TEXT: Want to select a national network instead?
destination.NO_NETWORKS: There are no regional networks for the current selection.
destination.REGIONAL_RESTRICTION_LOCATION: This network could be restricted to the location you selected

recipient.TITLE: Recipient Information
recipient.DESC: We need a little information about the person you are sending money to. Be sure to enter their name exactly as it appears on their ID. If the name you enter differs from the name on your recipient’s ID, they might have difficulty retrieving their money.
recipient.DESC_MOBILE_1: We need a little information about the person you are sending money to.
recipient.DESC_MOBILE_2: Be sure to enter the name of your recipient exactly as it appears on their ID.

funding.TITLE: Funding Information
funding.DESC: We have several ways to send money. How would you like to pay for your transaction?
funding.DESC_BANK_ACCOUNT: It looks like you'll be sending money from your bank account today. We'll need a little more information about your bank in order to complete your transaction. To verify your account, Viamericas will deposit two small amounts into your bank account (both for less than $1.00). The deposits should show up in your bank account within one business day. Please check your account and write down the exact value of the each deposit. Once you have these two deposit amounts, follow these steps:
funding.DESC_BANK_ACCOUNT_3_ENTER: Enter the two deposit amounts in the fields provided and click
funding.DESC_BANK_ACCOUNT_4: You are now ready to use your bank account to send money!
funding.DESC_CASH_2: We have thousands of agent locations near you to complete your cash transaction. Let’s find the one that works best for you. Click on the agent location for more details.
funding.DESC_CASH_3: Your transaction is almost complete! Print this screen and take it with you to the agent location you chose. You’ll give these instructions and your cash to the agent, who will complete the transaction and print your receipt.
funding.DESC_CASH_3_DONT: Don’t forget to sign up for SMS updates to track your transactions by texting START to 301-842-7674.
funding.DESC_CARD_1_IT_LOOKS: It looks like you’ll be sending money from your credit card. We’ll need some basic information from your card to complete the transaction.
funding.DESC_CARD_2_IF_YOU: If you frequently send money using your credit card, consider saving your card information in
funding.DESC_CARD_4_SEND: so you can send money faster!
funding.CASH_MAP_DESC: Begin your search by entering in your address, city or zip code
funding.CASH_STEPS_TITLE: Show this screen to your local agent to complete the transaction.
funding.SELECT_LOCATION_BEFORE_CONTINUE: Please select a location before you continue
funding.BANK_BELOW: Enter your bank account details below
funding.INVALID_DATE: Your expiration date is invalid, please use a different card
funding.DISCLAIMER: Your credit card company may charge a fee for cash advances
funding.NEW_CARD_DESC: You can add a new card below
funding.NEW_ACCOUNT_DESC: You can add a new account below

funding_bank_account_added.TITLE: Your account is currently being validated
funding_bank_account_added.DESC: Viamericas will deposit two small amounts (less than $1.00) into your bank account. When you receive those deposits, click on Verify Account and enter the amounts deposited. Deposits may take 1-3 days to appear in your account.

review.DESC: Review your transaction and be sure your details are correct before pressing send.
review.NOT_SAVED_AMOUNT: *Click on the check mark to set the amount

repeatTransaction.NOT_SAVED_AMOUNT: *Click on the check mark to set the amount

confirmation.SENT_DESC: Nicely done! You can track your payment below.

bank_info.TITLE: Bank Information
bank_info.DESC: We'll just need a little information about the bank you'll be sending money to.

transaction_history.PAGE_DESC: You can view your transaction history below.
transaction_history.TAB_DESC_1: You can view your transaction history below.
transaction_history.TAB_DESC_2: You can view your pending history below.

settings.VERIFY_ACCOUNT_DESC: Enter the two amount deposited into your account below to complete verification.

bank_account_added.TITLE: Your account is currently being validated
bank_account_added.DESC: Viamericas will deposit two small amounts (less than $1.00) into your bank account. When you receive those deposits, click on Verify Account and enter the amounts deposited. Deposits may take 1-3 days to appear in your account.
bank_account_added.BUTTON_ACTIVATE: This button will activate when Viamericas has deposited two small amounts (less than $1.00) into your bank account.
bank_account_added.ACCOUNT_BLOCKED: The account was blocked because of too many failed verification attempts

contact_us.TITLE: Contact Us
contact_us.DESC: At Viamericas, we are dedicated to providing excellent customer service. Please contact us with questions or let us know how we may serve you better. Our friendly bilingual Customer Service Representatives are standing by to assist you.
contact_us.SENT_MESSAGE_DESC: We will be in contact with you shortly.

how_it_works.TITLE: How it Works
how_it_works.GET_QUOTE_DESC: Get the exchange rate and fees for any country. Then simply enter in your recipient’s information and how they should receive the money. You can send money directly to their bank account or choose a location for them to pick up cash.
how_it_works.FUND_DESC: Paying for a transaction is easy. Vianex lets you send money using your bank account, credit or debit card. Whatever is most convenient for you.
how_it_works.SEND_DESC: Once you’ve entered your recipient’s information and funded your transaction, simply review and send! Vianex takes care of the rest. We will notify you when the money is ready for your recipient to pick up.
how_it_works.CHOOSE_RECIPIENT: Enter your recipient's information and how they should receive the money. You can send money directly to their bank account, or have them pick up cash at any one of our convenient neighborhood
how_it_works.CHOOSE_PAYMENT_1: Paying for your money transfer is easy. Vianex lets you send money using our bank account, credit or debit card, or you can send cash using any Viamericas agent
how_it_works.SEND_MONEY: Once you've entered your recipient's information and chosen how you will make the payment, simply review and send! Receive text alerts about your money transfer status.
how_it_works.BANER_TEXT_1_1: Choose the country you wish to send money to, then choose how the money will be received. You can deposit money directly into a bank account or send cash for pick up at any of our 40,000+ locations across 34 countries.
how_it_works.BANER_TEXT_1_2: Our premier list of payers gives you options for the best rate.
how_it_works.BANER_TEXT_2: Enter a few details about the person you are sending money to. This helps us ensure the security of your money transfer.
how_it_works.BANER_TEXT_3: Decide how you would like to pay for your money transfer. Vianex lets you pay using your credit or debit card. You can also send money directly from your bank account.
how_it_works.BANER_TEXT_4_1: Review your money transfer order details to ensure that everything is correct and hit SEND MONEY. You will receive your receipt by email, and can track your order status in MY ACCOUNT.
how_it_works.BANER_TEXT_4_2: We will ensure your money gets to your recipient quickly and safely.

get_a_quote.TITLE: Get A Quote
get_a_quote.BEST_EXCHANGE_RATES: Best exchange rates for the top

locations.TITLE: Locations
locations.DESC: We have thousands of agent locations to choose from. What works best for you?
locations.TEXAS_LINK: Click here for agent locations in Texas.

compliance.TITLE: Compliance
compliance.SUBTITLE: Anti-Money Laundering and Anti-Terrorism Program
compliance.DESC_1: Viamericas Corporation, our management and board of directors are committed to preventing and deterring the use of the company’s money transfer services for any unlawful purpose.  Viamericas’ anti-money laundering and anti-terrorism financing compliance program has been designed to impede, detect and report any attempted illicit use of Viamericas’ services.
compliance.DESC_2: Viamericas takes compliance seriously, striving to safeguard your financial transactions and ensure that our services are not being used for illicit purposes.  To this end, we continuously monitor and analyze the transactions that are processed through our platform, carefully scrutinize the agents and foreign correspondents that are part of the Viamericas network, and regularly train representatives to remain vigilant for potential abuses of Viamericas services.
compliance.DESC_3: Our compliance program meets or exceeds applicable legal requirements.  Viamericas’ policies and procedures undergo an annual independent review, and we are regularly audited by state and federal regulators.
compliance.DESC_4_COMMENTS: For comments or questions regarding Viamericas’ compliance program, contact us at
compliance.INFO_DESC: Choose a state below to view the name and address of the chosen state’s regulatory agency.

correspondents.TITLE: Payer Network
correspondents.DESC: Vianex understands that receiving money should be just as easy as sending it. Whether you are sending money for deposit into a bank account or for cash pickup, our extensive network of over 40,000+ convenient payout locations in 34 countries makes receiving your money transfer easy.
correspondents.DESC_2: Enter the country you are sending money to below for a list of convenient Vianex payer network partners in Mexico, Central and South America, the Philippines, India and other countries.
